works.title: DEXMA
works.headline: Energy intelligence software for organisations taking action on climate change
works.description: With data-driven Energy Intelligence, DEXMA helps ESCOs, Utilities, OEMs, Energy Consultants & Green Corporates optimise their Energy Transition and reach their Sustainability goals.
works.skills:
idea generation
sketching
wireframing
mockup design
UI and UX design

works.title: no-more
works.headline: PowerPoint services for demanding professionals
works.description: No-more provides professional PowerPoint support for consultants through top talent around the globe, with a median turnaround time of 8.7 hours, and 24-hour availability on weekdays so companies can focus on the work they do best. Clients send them input and instructions. Their global team uses the client's organizational guidelines to produce quality output. And the European team ensures high quality in everything that leaves the assembly line.

frontend development

MPA
CSR and SSR

works.title: knowmore
works.headline: Focus on designing. Project managers handle the clients
works.description: Knowmore is working as one company with No-more. Knowmore is a global freelance platform that empowers specialists to earn money while working from home alongside support from their European team of project managers.

works.title: Rejoose
works.headline: Rejoose is a free software for documenting environmental impacts within the ICT sector.
works.description: In Rejoose, companies can present energy overviews and reports with ease. They can quickly calculate, benchmark and showcase detailed environmental results from any data center and IT-installation.

works.title: Rommel
works.headline: Rommel is Copenhagen's WordPress Web Agency
works.description:
Rommel is a Copenhagen-based web agency that creates ecommerce solutions and websites. They are known for high quality, service runs though their veins, and they have an eye for detail. They are trained in the creative and digital industry.
They offer customised, professional and trustable solutions for all kinds of clients, whether they be sole traders, ambitious new startups, established businesses, organisations or the public sector.
